title: Frontend Implementation Plan for Marisol's Beauty Salon

requirements.summary: Create hero section with headline, subheadline, and two CTA buttons (Book Appointment scroll, Call Now with tel: link)
acceptanceCriteria: Hero section displays the headline and subheadline prominently
Two CTA buttons are visible and styled consistently
Call Now button uses tel:(747) 279-8532 link for click-to-call
Book Appointment button scrolls smoothly to the booking form section

file_operations.description: Create hero section component with headline 'Enhancing Your Natural Beauty with Style & Care', subheadline 'Professional Hair & Beauty Services in San Fernando, CA', background image from frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-salon-interior.dim_1920x1080.png, 'Book Appointment' button that scrolls to booking form, and 'Call Now â€“ (747) 279-8532' button with tel:(747) 279-8532 link
Import and render HeroSection component at the top of the main page layout

requirements.summary: Create About Us section introducing Marisol with 4.6-star rating display
acceptanceCriteria: Section includes introduction text about Marisol's expertise
4.6-star rating is visually displayed
Content conveys warmth and professionalism

file_operations.description: Create About Us section component featuring Marisol's introduction as a skilled and experienced hairstylist dedicated to client satisfaction, highlighting friendly service and professional techniques, display 4.6-star rating visually with star icons, and include image from frontend/public/assets/generated/about-marisol.dim_800x600.png
Import and render AboutSection component after HeroSection in the main page layout

requirements.summary: Create Services section with five detailed service cards (Haircut & Styling, Hair Coloring, Hair Treatments, Blow Dry, Beauty Services)
acceptanceCriteria: Five service cards are displayed with titles, descriptions, and starting prices
Cards are visually consistent and easy to read
Layout works on mobile and desktop

file_operations.description: Create Services section component with five service cards: Haircut & Styling (using frontend/public/assets/generated/service-haircut.dim_400x400.png), Hair Coloring (using frontend/public/assets/generated/service-coloring.dim_400x400.png), Hair Treatments (using frontend/public/assets/generated/service-treatment.dim_400x400.png), Blow Dry (using frontend/public/assets/generated/service-blowdry.dim_400x400.png), and Beauty Services (using frontend/public/assets/generated/service-beauty.dim_400x400.png). Each card displays title, description, and starting price placeholder. Use responsive grid layout
Import and render ServicesSection component after AboutSection in the main page layout

requirements.summary: Implement online booking form with all required fields and frontend submission flow using backend submitBooking method
acceptanceCriteria: Form includes all required fields with proper input types
Service dropdown lists all five services
Date and time inputs are user-friendly
Form submission stores booking data in backend
User receives confirmation after successful submission

file_operations.description: Create booking form component with fields: Full Name (text), Phone Number (tel), Email (email), Select Service (dropdown with Haircut & Styling, Hair Coloring, Hair Treatments, Blow Dry, Beauty Services), Preferred Date (date input), Preferred Time (time input), and Submit button. On submit, call backend.submitBooking() with form data. Display confirmation message on success and error handling on failure. Add id='booking-form' for scroll targeting
Import and render BookingForm component after ServicesSection in the main page layout

requirements.summary: Create Gallery section with responsive grid displaying before/after transformations and salon interior images
acceptanceCriteria: Gallery displays images in a responsive grid layout
Images are optimized for web performance
Grid adjusts appropriately for mobile devices

file_operations.description: Create Gallery section component with responsive grid layout displaying images: frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-transformation-1.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-transformation-2.dim_800x600.png, frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-interior-1.dim_800x600.png, and frontend/public/assets/generated/gallery-interior-2.dim_800x600.png. Use modern grid layout that adapts to mobile, tablet, and desktop screens
Import and render GallerySection component after BookingForm in the main page layout

requirements.summary: Create Reviews section displaying 4.6-star Google rating and 3-5 client testimonials
acceptanceCriteria: 4.6-star rating is prominently displayed with star icons
3-5 testimonial cards are shown with client names and ratings
Section is visually appealing and trustworthy

file_operations.description: Create Reviews section component displaying 4.6-star Google rating prominently with star icons, followed by 3-5 client testimonial cards. Each testimonial includes client name, star rating, and review text. Use visually appealing card layout that conveys trust and professionalism
Import and render ReviewsSection component after GallerySection in the main page layout

requirements.summary: Create Contact section with address, click-to-call phone, embedded Google Map, and business hours
acceptanceCriteria: Address is displayed and formatted correctly
Phone number uses tel:(747) 279-8532 link for click-to-call
Google Map is embedded showing the correct location
Business hours are clearly listed

file_operations.description: Create Contact section component displaying address '11430 Laurel Canyon Blvd C, San Fernando, CA 91340', phone number '(747) 279-8532' with tel:(747) 279-8532 link for click-to-call, embedded Google Map iframe for the address location, and business hours list. Ensure all contact information is prominently displayed and easily accessible
Import and render ContactSection component after ReviewsSection in the main page layout

requirements.summary: Apply soft feminine color palette (rose gold, beige, white, black) with clean, premium, welcoming salon design
acceptanceCriteria: Color palette uses rose gold, beige, white, and black as primary colors
Typography and spacing convey elegance and professionalism
Overall design feels cohesive and premium
Design works harmoniously across all sections

file_operations.description: Define CSS custom properties for rose gold (#D4AF7A), beige (#F5E6D3), white (#FFFFFF), and black (#000000) color palette. Apply elegant typography with refined font choices, generous spacing, and premium styling that creates a welcoming, trustworthy salon atmosphere throughout the application

Extend Tailwind theme with custom colors for rose gold, beige, and refined shades that align with the soft feminine salon aesthetic. Configure spacing, font families, and design tokens to support the premium, clean, and stylish design requirements

requirements.summary: Ensure full mobile responsiveness with fast loading and optimized images
acceptanceCriteria: Website renders correctly on mobile, tablet, and desktop screens
Images are optimized for web (compressed, appropriate dimensions)
Page loads quickly without excessive delays

file_operations.description: Add responsive classes and mobile-optimized styling to hero section. Ensure background image loads efficiently and layout adapts to mobile, tablet, and desktop viewports
Add responsive grid layout that stacks service cards vertically on mobile and displays multiple columns on larger screens. Ensure service icons load efficiently
Add responsive grid layout that adjusts gallery columns based on viewport size. Ensure gallery images are properly sized and load efficiently
Add responsive layout for contact information and map that stacks vertically on mobile and displays side-by-side on desktop. Ensure Google Map embed is responsive

requirements.summary: Render generated salon images as static assets from frontend/public/assets/generated
acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored in frontend/public/assets/generated
Images are referenced correctly in components
Images load without backend routing

file_operations.description: Reference hero background image using path /assets/generated/hero-salon-interior.dim_1920x1080.png as a static asset
Reference about image using path /assets/generated/about-marisol.dim_800x600.png as a static asset

Reference service icon images using paths /assets/generated/service-haircut.dim_400x400.png, /assets/generated/service-coloring.dim_400x400.png, /assets/generated/service-treatment.dim_400x400.png, /assets/generated/service-blowdry.dim_400x400.png, and /assets/generated/service-beauty.dim_400x400.png as static assets

Reference gallery images using paths /assets/generated/gallery-transformation-1.dim_800x600.png, /assets/generated/gallery-transformation-2.dim_800x600.png, /assets/generated/gallery-interior-1.dim_800x600.png, and /assets/generated/gallery-interior-2.dim_800x600.png as static assets
